text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami tomalokara pratisrauti laichilo arau tura parbataka tomalokara oparata uttolana karaichilo, (arau kaichilo) ‘yi pradana karailo seya drrhabharae grahana karaa arau (manoyoga sahakarae) suna’. Sihamte kaichila, ‘ami sunilo arau aman'ya karailo’, arau kupharaira karane sihamtara antarata damuraipraiti somoraa'i diya haichila. Koraa, ‘yadi tomaloke mumina tente tomalokara imane tomalokaka yi nirdesa diye seya kimana ye nikrsta!’
